ref: 6574 daívya ʻ divine ʼ, n. ʻ divine strength ʼ RV., ʻ fate ʼ lex., cf. dēvyà -- n. ʻ divine power ʼ RV. 2. daíviya -- (metr. RV.), cf. daivika -- ʻ divine ʼ Mn., n. ʻ fatal chance ʼ Yājñ. [dēvá -- 1: √div1]
Pk. devva -- ʻ divine ʼ, m.n. ʻ fate ʼ;
Kt. dēbi ʻ divine ʼ, deb -- lole ʻ chanting priest ʼ;
Ku. deb ʻ sun, sky ʼ, deba kī ghām ʻ sunstroke ʼ.
